oai_dc:dc.dc:title: (Review B) "Jain Life Reimagined: An Examination of Jain Practice and Discourse during the Covid-19 Pandemic"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anonymous
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: review
preprint
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is the second review of the preprinted article "Jain Life Reimagined: An Examination of Jain Practice and Discourse during the Covid-19 Pandemic." The review will be taken offline once the final article has appeared. The reviewed article can be found under the following link: (PREPRINT) Jain Life Reimagined: An Examination of Jain Practice and Discourse during the Covid-19 Pandemic | Entangled Religions (rub.de)
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Entangled Religions; Vol. 12 No. 3: Religion and Pandemic: Shifts in Interpretations, Popular Lore, and Practices
